con:config.script:
String date = new Date() date = date.replaceAll(":","_") date = date.replaceAll(" ","_") Email_ID = "\"" + "Emp_" + date + "@mailinator.com" + "\"" Email_ID = Email_ID.toUpperCase() Email_ID_string = "Emp_" + date + "@mailinator.com" Email_ID_string = Email_ID_string.toUpperCase() testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Email_ID", Email_ID) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Email_ID_string", Email_ID_string)
def Alternate_Email_ID = "\"" + "EmpAlt_" + date + "@mailinator.com" + "\"" Alternate_Email_ID = Alternate_Email_ID.toUpperCase() def Alternate_Email_ID_String = Alternate_Email_ID.replace("\"", "") testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Alternate_Email", Alternate_Email_ID) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Alternate_Email_String", Alternate_Email_ID_String)

con:restRequest.name: Create EmpAccount_Positive
con:restRequest.con:request: { "companyId": ${#TestCase#Company_ID}, "languageId": ${DataSource#Language_ID}, "statusId": ${DataSource#Status_ID}, "firstName": ${DataSource#First_Name}, "lastName": ${DataSource#Last_Name}, "email": ${#TestCase#Email_ID}, "emailConfirmedAt": null, "signedInCount": 0, "currentSignInAt": null, "lastSignInAt": null, "lockedAt": null, "resetPasswordSentAt": null, "confirmationSentAt": null, "phoneNo": ${DataSource#Phone_No.}, "createdAt": null, "updatedAt": null, "m2mUserId": 0, "notificationId": 0, "password": ${DataSource#Password}, "phoneVerificationSentAt": null, "verificationCode": 0, "phoneVerificationConfirmedAt": null, "validateMobile": false }

con:restRequest.name: Create EmpAccount_Negative
con:restRequest.con:request: { "companyId": ${#TestCase#Company_ID}, "languageId": ${DataSource#Language_ID}, "statusId": ${DataSource#Status_ID}, "firstName": ${DataSource#First_Name}, "lastName": ${DataSource#Last_Name}, "email": ${#TestCase#Email_ID}, "emailConfirmedAt": null, "signedInCount": 0, "currentSignInAt": null, "lastSignInAt": null, "lockedAt": null, "resetPasswordSentAt": null, "confirmationSentAt": null, "phoneNo": ${DataSource#Phone_No.}, "createdAt": null, "updatedAt": null, "m2mUserId": 0, "notificationId": 0, "password": ${DataSource#Password}, "phoneVerificationSentAt": null, "verificationCode": 0, "phoneVerificationConfirmedAt": null, "validateMobile": false }
